original_text: But he did not consummate their marriage until she gave birth to a son. And he gave him the name Jesus.
korean_text: 아들을 낳기까지 동침하지 아니하더니 낳으매 이름을 예수라 하니라

sentences.original_text: But he did not consummate their marriage
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그들의 혼인을 이루지 않았다

sentences.original_text: until she gave birth to a son
And he gave him the name Jesus
